data_table.description: Ultrasound Imputed Values, Black Males, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: RESPONS4
variable.description: Number of observed sites [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUM4WT45
variable.description: Number of observed values / 6 = weight for Sum45_21, 2, or 3 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: LOPDWA45
variable.description: Weight for LOPDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDWA45
variable.description: Weight for ROPDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDWA45
variable.description: Weight for LBIDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDWA45
variable.description: Weight for RBIDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDWA45
variable.description: Weight for LINDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDWA45
variable.description: Weight for RINDWA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUM45_41
variable.description: Mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUM45_42
variable.description: Weighted mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUM45_43
variable.description: Z-score summary statistic for the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 4]
